name: Jinchou Fight
description:
Jinchou Fight

This 2D local multiplayer shooter game lets up to four players beat each other until the last jinchou stands. The characters of the game are penguins from four different clans: the Azule clan (blue), the Ornch clan (orange), the Canary clan (yellow), and the Vermilion clan (red). Fighting for dominance and to find out who is the strongest clan

This game is still in development. Your feedback is much appreciated!

Requirements:

Please use 2-4 controllers to make the game works. Use mouse for navigation.
